channel.title: Zillescape [508 RSPS] Looking for coders!
channel.description:
Hello im owner of Zillescape!
We're looking for few coders to our server. Hopefully we will get 1-2 pretty experienced coders to do amazing updates and fix few glitches! The coder(s) will get co-owner ingame.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-cB8vDBzAyw
Watch the video it shows what kind of server this is: Few thing from it:
- Working ::item (id) (amount) what really takes money from ur inventory. - 20m starter. To get more cash pk some items and do ::sellitem (id) (amount). - Bh with targets, pvp drops. I will tell you more information about the server. When you want to come code. Btw its Rule-12's base.
If your interested of coming to code send me pm on these forums or leave comment on the youtube video/ Pm on the youtube! Thanks!

item.title: Zillescape [508 RSPS] Looking for coders!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Your looking in the wrong spot.

Post a dev. thread.

Read full topic
